title: Lead Management System
description: A system designed to simplify the analysis of employee leads within an organization, providing efficient tracking and management of lead data.

title: Course Management System
description: A Course Management System designed to facilitate learning of the latest programming languages by building a dynamic web application with a user-friendly interface.

title: Weather App
description: A dynamic weather application that provides real-time weather conditions for any city, featuring detailed forecasts and a user-friendly interface built with Python, Django, and modern web technologies.

title: Room Listing Platform
description: A user-friendly platform that helps people find and book rooms on rent. It allows users to search for available accommodations, view detailed property information, and easily navigate through listings. Built with Python and Django, this app offers a smooth experience for both guests and property owners.

title: Web Scraping Bot
description: A powerful web scraping bot designed to collect and analyze data from various websites. This tool automates the process of extracting information, enabling users to gather insights and data easily. Built with Python, it utilizes libraries like selenium and web drivers for efficient web scraping, ensuring accurate and organized data retrieval.
